entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers this evening. A few flurries beginning near midnight. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 late this evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 10 in the afternoon. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 70 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing near noon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 10 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023
